name: Pembrey
description: Two young film makers travel out deep into the Pembrey Forest in search for footage for their documentary. Record and document your findings and unravel the truth behind the famous "Pembrey Forest".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 940M or Higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 940M or Higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
